description: Add a palette logo icon to the left of the 'k.l.b designs' text in the sidebar header
steps_to_verify: Navigate to any page on the site
Verify a palette SVG icon appears to the left of 'k.l.b designs' in the sidebar
Icon should be white and approximately 24-32px in size

description: Add 'FINE ART' tagline below the 'k.l.b designs' brand name in smaller, lighter text
steps_to_verify: Navigate to any page on the site
Verify 'FINE ART' text appears below 'k.l.b designs'
Text should be smaller font size and lighter weight than the brand name
Text should be white/light colored

description: Add 'Gallery' as the first navigation link in the sidebar, linking to the home/gallery page
steps_to_verify: Navigate to any page on the site
Verify 'Gallery' link appears as first item below the brand section
Clicking 'Gallery' navigates to the home page (gallery view)
Link has hover state changing color

description: Add horizontal separator line between main nav links (Gallery, About, Contact) and Collections dropdown
steps_to_verify: Navigate to any page on the site
Verify a subtle horizontal line separates the main links from Collections
Line should be semi-transparent white or lighter teal color

description: Add 'All Works' as the first option in the Collections dropdown menu with highlighted/selected state
steps_to_verify: Open the Collections dropdown in the sidebar
Verify 'All Works' appears as first option
When on the main gallery, 'All Works' should have a highlighted background (darker teal)
Clicking 'All Works' navigates to the main gallery page

description: Display piece count next to each collection name in the Collections dropdown
steps_to_verify: Open the Collections dropdown in the sidebar
Each collection should show a number count on the right side (e.g., 'Abstract Series 5')
Count should be right-aligned and lighter/muted color
Counts should reflect actual number of items in each collection

description: Add copyright text '© 2024 k.l.b designs' at the bottom of the sidebar
steps_to_verify: Navigate to any page on the site
Verify copyright text appears at very bottom of sidebar
Text should be small, muted/light colored
Year should be dynamic or use current year

description: Add page title section above gallery grid with collection name and piece count
steps_to_verify: Navigate to the main gallery page
Verify 'All Works' title appears at top in large serif font
Verify piece count (e.g., '12 pieces') appears below title in smaller gray text
Title should change to collection name when viewing a specific collection

description: Change gallery grid from 4 columns to 3 columns on desktop
steps_to_verify: Navigate to the gallery page on desktop (>1024px width)
Verify images are displayed in a 3-column masonry grid
Images should maintain aspect ratio
Columns should have consistent gap spacing

description: Add rounded corners to all gallery images
steps_to_verify: Navigate to the gallery page
Verify all images have rounded corners (approximately 8-12px radius)
Corners should be consistent across all images

description: Add subtle shadow/card effect to gallery images
steps_to_verify: Navigate to the gallery page
Verify images have a subtle drop shadow creating a card-like appearance
Shadow should be light gray and not overly prominent

description: Add hover overlay to gallery images showing artwork title and medium
steps_to_verify: Navigate to the gallery page
Hover over any image
Verify a gradient overlay appears at bottom of image
Verify artwork title appears in white text (larger)
Verify medium/category appears below title (smaller, lighter text)
Overlay should fade in smoothly on hover

description: Redesign lightbox to display image on left and details panel on right
steps_to_verify: Click any gallery image to open lightbox
Verify image appears on the left side of the modal
Verify a white details panel appears on the right side
Background should be blurred and dimmed

description: Add artwork title and category to the lightbox details panel
steps_to_verify: Click any gallery image to open lightbox
Verify artwork title appears at top of details panel in large serif font
Verify category/collection name appears below title in gray text

description: Add artwork metadata (Medium, Dimensions, Year) to lightbox details panel
steps_to_verify: Click any gallery image to open lightbox
Verify 'Medium' label with value appears (e.g., 'Mixed Media')
Verify 'Dimensions' label with value appears (e.g., '30" × 40"')
Verify 'Year' label with value appears (e.g., '2024')
Labels should be left-aligned, values right-aligned

description: Add left and right arrow buttons to navigate between images in lightbox
steps_to_verify: Click any gallery image to open lightbox
Verify left arrow button appears on left side of lightbox
Verify right arrow button appears on right side of lightbox
Clicking arrows navigates to previous/next image
Arrows should have circular background and be positioned outside image area

description: Add image counter showing current position (e.g., '3 / 12') to lightbox
steps_to_verify: Click any gallery image to open lightbox
Verify image counter appears at bottom center (e.g., '3 / 12')
Counter should update when navigating between images
Text should be white and centered

description: Add X close button to top-right corner of lightbox
steps_to_verify: Click any gallery image to open lightbox
Verify X icon appears in top-right corner
Clicking X closes the lightbox
Icon should be white and clearly visible

description: Extend Contentful data model to include artwork title field
steps_to_verify: Check Contentful content type includes 'title' field
Verify title is fetched and available in Gallery component
Title displays correctly in hover overlay and lightbox

description: Extend Contentful data model to include artwork medium field
steps_to_verify: Check Contentful content type includes 'medium' field
Verify medium is fetched and available in Gallery component
Medium displays correctly in hover overlay and lightbox details

description: Extend Contentful data model to include artwork dimensions field
steps_to_verify: Check Contentful content type includes 'dimensions' field
Verify dimensions is fetched and available in Gallery component
Dimensions display correctly in lightbox details panel

description: Extend Contentful data model to include artwork year field
steps_to_verify: Check Contentful content type includes 'year' field
Verify year is fetched and available in Gallery component
Year displays correctly in lightbox details panel

description: Update API to fetch and return collection item counts
steps_to_verify: Call getTags() function
Verify each collection object includes an 'itemCount' or 'count' property
Count reflects actual number of items tagged with that collection

description: Update Tailwind config to add new colors for card shadows and overlays
steps_to_verify: Check tailwind.config.mjs includes appropriate shadow utilities
Verify overlay gradient colors are defined
Colors are consistent with teal brand palette

description: Add serif font family for page titles and artwork titles (e.g., Playfair Display)
steps_to_verify: Check Layout.astro includes Google Fonts link for serif font
Verify tailwind.config.mjs has serif font family defined
Page titles 'All Works' and artwork titles use serif font

description: Ensure lightbox navigation is keyboard accessible
steps_to_verify: Open lightbox using Enter/Space key on gallery image
Use left/right arrow keys to navigate images
Use Escape key to close lightbox
Focus is trapped within lightbox when open

description: Update mobile hamburger menu to match new sidebar design
steps_to_verify: View site on mobile device or narrow viewport
Open hamburger menu
Verify menu includes logo icon, tagline, Gallery link, and copyright
Verify Collections dropdown shows counts
